alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 11 at 8:57PM MDT until April 13 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches, locally higher. * WHERE...Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs and Central Mountains. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 3 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected on all area routes. Traction restrictions may be enacted.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs
